rule.name: AS_QNM_VD_importReferenceQuestions
rule.description: Validations to run when adding questions

a:expectedOutput.a:value: You must add at least one question

el.a:name: Task with missing doc type code

a:expectedOutput.a:value: {"The following fields are required for each question: Question, Type, and Response"}

a:ruleInputTestConfigs.a:value: repeat( 3, 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:QNM}AS_QNM_R_Question'( defaultLabel: repeat(10, "this is a very long name"), questionTypeCode: #"_a-0000e447-91f4-8000-9bc0-011c48011c48_569158", ) )

a:expectedOutput.a:value: {"You cannot have two questions with the same name"}
